footer.companyDescription: OMG Agents provides customized AI solutions for small and medium enterprises, combining proprietary algorithms with personal consultation to drive business growth.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: OMG Agents ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy and handling your personal information in accordance with applicable laws. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our services.

informationCollection.title: 2. Information We Collect
informationCollection.content:
We may collect the following types of personal information:
â€¢ Name, email address, phone number
â€¢ Company name, job title, department
â€¢ Service usage information
â€¢ Inquiry content
â€¢ Website usage data (IP address, browser information, access times, etc.)

informationUse.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
informationUse.content:
We use the collected personal information for the following purposes:
â€¢ Providing and operating our services
â€¢ Customer support
â€¢ Service improvement and development
â€¢ Marketing activities (with your consent)
â€¢ Legal compliance

informationSharing.title: 4. Information Sharing
informationSharing.content:
We will not share your personal information with third parties except in the following cases:
â€¢ When required by law
â€¢ When necessary to protect life, body, or property
â€¢ When necessary for public health or child welfare

dataSecurity.title: 5. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

dataRetention.title: 6. Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, taking into account the nature of the information and the purpose of its use.

userRights.title: 7. Your Rights
userRights.content: You have the right to request access, correction, deletion, or restriction of processing of your personal information. We will respond to such requests within a reasonable timeframe.

contact.title: 8. Contact Us
contact.content:
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
Email: contact@omgagents.ai
Address: Tsukuba, Japan

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of OMG Agents' AI solution services ("Service"). By using our Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms.

serviceDescription.title: 2. Service Description
serviceDescription.content: Our Service provides customized AI solutions for small and medium enterprises. Specific service details are outlined in individual contracts.

userObligations.title: 3. User Obligations
userObligations.content:
Users must:
â€¢ Comply with these Terms
â€¢ Provide accurate information
â€¢ Use the Service only for lawful purposes
â€¢ Not infringe on third-party rights
â€¢ Follow our instructions

prohibitedActivities.title: 4. Prohibited Activities
prohibitedActivities.content:
Users may not:
â€¢ Violate laws or public order
â€¢ Engage in criminal activities
â€¢ Disrupt or damage our servers or networks
â€¢ Interfere with our service operations
â€¢ Collect or accumulate personal information about other users

intellectualProperty.title: 5. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All intellectual property rights in our Service belong to us or our licensors. Using our Service does not grant you any rights to these intellectual properties.

serviceModification.title: 6. Service Changes
serviceModification.content: We may modify or discontinue our Service with prior notice. We are not liable for any damages resulting from such changes.

liability.title: 7. Disclaimer
liability.content: We make no warranties, express or implied, regarding the Service's safety, reliability, accuracy, completeness, effectiveness, or security.

governingLaw.title: 8. Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms are governed by Japanese law. Any disputes will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in our headquarters' location.

contact.title: 9. Contact Us
contact.content:
For questions about these Terms, please contact us at:
Email: contact@omgagents.ai
Address: Tsukuba, Japan

hero.title: We help {smes} and thrive with personalized {aiSolutions}
hero.description: From intelligent {chatAgents} to complete {aiStrategy} - we combine {inHouseAlgorithms} with personal consultation to deliver solutions that actually fit your business.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: What is OMG Agents SaaS?
about.mainHeading: We provide personalized AI SaaS solutions and strategic consultation, combining our proprietary algorithms with hands-on partnership.
about.description: OMG Agents is developing next-generation AI SaaS solutions with top industry professionals and our proprietary in-house algorithms. Our platform addresses the specific automation and customer engagement challenges that SMEs encounter as they scale.
about.card1Summary: 100% proprietary technology developed by our expert team
about.card1Description: Our algorithms are built from scratch by our team of AI specialists with over 10 years of experience in machine learning and natural language processing. Unlike off-the-shelf solutions that try to fit every business, our proprietary technology is designed specifically for SME needs.
about.card1Benefit1: Faster implementation times (30-60 days vs 6+ months)
about.card1Benefit2: Better performance optimized for your specific use cases
about.card1Benefit4: Direct access to our development team for modifications
about.card1Benefit5: Seamless integration with your existing tools and workflows
about.card2Summary: Individual guidance for your business transformation
about.card2Description: Every OMG Agents client gets a dedicated consultant who becomes an extension of your team. We don't just deploy software - we partner with you through every step of your AI transformation journey, ensuring success from day one through long-term growth.
about.card2Benefit1: Dedicated consultant who learns your business inside-out
about.card2Benefit3: Custom training for your team on the new systems
about.card2Benefit4: Ongoing optimization based on performance data
about.card2Benefit5: Direct phone/email access to your consultant
about.card3Summary: Built specifically for growing businesses and their challenges
about.card3Description: While enterprise solutions are built for Fortune 500 companies with massive IT teams and budgets, we specialize exclusively in the unique needs, constraints, and opportunities of small and medium enterprises. Our solutions scale with your growth.
about.card3Benefit2: Quick integration with existing tools (CRM, email, etc.)
about.card3Benefit3: Scales automatically as your business grows
about.card3Benefit4: No need for dedicated IT staff to manage
about.card3Benefit5: Flexible contracts that adapt to your changing needs
about.card4Summary: Always evolving with your needs and industry changes
about.card4Description: Your AI solution doesn't end at deployment. We continuously monitor performance, analyze new opportunities, and proactively suggest improvements. As AI technology advances and your business grows, your solution evolves with you.
about.card4Benefit1: Monthly performance reviews and optimization suggestions
about.card4Benefit2: Automatic updates with latest AI capabilities
about.card4Benefit3: Proactive identification of new automation opportunities
about.card4Benefit4: Regular strategy sessions to align with business goals
about.card4Benefit5: Access to new features as they're developed

demoRequests.customerService: Hi, I'm interested in learning more about your Customer Service Agent solution. Could you please provide me with a demo and more information about how it can help automate our customer support processes?
demoRequests.internalHelpdesk: Hello, I'd like to request a demo of your Internal Helpdesk Bot. We're looking to streamline our employee support processes and would love to see how this solution could work for our organization.
demoRequests.knowledgeBase: Hi there, I'm interested in your Knowledge Base Assistant. Could you please arrange a demo to show us how it can help improve our internal knowledge management and employee self-service capabilities?
demoRequests.callCenter: Hello, I'd like to request a demo of your Call Center AI solution. We're looking to enhance our phone support operations and would appreciate seeing how your voice intelligence technology works.
demoRequests.voiceAutomation: Hi, I'm interested in learning more about your Voice Automation system. Could you please provide a demo showing how it can help streamline our voice-based customer interactions?
demoRequests.securityMonitoring: Hello, I'd like to request a demo of your Security & Monitoring solution. We're interested in implementing visual AI for our security needs and would love to see how your technology works.
demoRequests.businessAnalytics: Hi there, I'm interested in your Business Analytics AI solution. Could you please arrange a demo to show us how it can help improve our data analysis and business insights?
demoRequests.general: Hello, I'm interested in learning more about your AI solutions. Could you please provide me with more information and arrange a demo to see how your technology could benefit our business?

chat.title: OMG Chat Solutions
chat.tagline: For customer service and internal support
chat.description: Maximize customer satisfaction and agent productivity with intelligent chat automation

voice.title: OMG Voice Intelligence
voice.tagline: For call centers and voice automation
voice.description: Transform phone interactions with AI voice agents that sound natural and deliver results

visual.title: OMG Visual Intelligence
visual.description: Advanced visual AI for security, elder care, and business analytics

customerService.name: Customer Service Agent
customerService.description: AI chat agents that handle customer inquiries from initial contact to resolution
customerService.fullDescription: Our Customer Service Agent handles up to 80% of routine customer inquiries automatically, escalating complex issues to human agents with full context. Built specifically for SMEs, it integrates with your existing CRM and support tools.

internalHelpdesk.name: Internal Helpdesk Bot
internalHelpdesk.description: Streamline employee support with AI that handles HR, IT, and operational questions
internalHelpdesk.fullDescription: Reduce internal support tickets by 70% with an AI assistant that handles employee questions about policies, procedures, IT issues, and more. Integrates with your internal systems and learns from your documentation.

leadQualification.name: Lead Qualification Assistant
leadQualification.description: Automatically qualify and route leads while gathering key customer information
leadQualification.fullDescription: Turn website visitors into qualified leads automatically. Our AI engages prospects, asks qualifying questions, and routes hot leads to your sales team with complete conversation context and scoring.

voiceAgent.name: AI Voice Agent
voiceAgent.description: Handle incoming calls with natural-sounding AI that can resolve complex service issues
voiceAgent.fullDescription: Our AI Voice Agent handles customer calls with human-like conversation skills, resolving issues, booking appointments, and providing information. Perfect for SMEs that want enterprise-level phone support without the cost.

callAnalytics.name: Call Analytics Platform
callAnalytics.description: Real-time insights into call patterns, sentiment analysis, and performance metrics
callAnalytics.fullDescription: Get deep insights into your phone interactions with AI-powered analytics. Track sentiment, identify trends, monitor agent performance, and discover opportunities to improve customer experience.

callCenterSolution.name: Complete Call Center Solution
callCenterSolution.description: End-to-end call center platform with AI agents, human backup, and management tools
callCenterSolution.fullDescription: Our comprehensive call center solution combines AI voice agents with human oversight, call routing, and management tools. Perfect for SMEs that need enterprise-level call center capabilities without the complexity and cost.

securityMonitoring.name: Security Monitoring System
securityMonitoring.description: AI-powered security cameras that detect unusual activity and send real-time alerts
securityMonitoring.fullDescription: Transform any camera into an intelligent security system. Our AI detects suspicious behavior, unauthorized access, and safety incidents in real-time, sending instant alerts to your security team or mobile device.

elderCare.name: Elder Care Monitor
elderCare.description: Discreet monitoring system that tracks activity patterns and detects emergencies
elderCare.fullDescription: Provide peace of mind for families with elderly relatives. Our AI monitors daily activity patterns, detects falls or unusual behavior, and alerts caregivers while respecting privacy and dignity.

businessAnalytics.name: Business Analytics Vision
businessAnalytics.description: Analyze customer behavior, foot traffic, and operational efficiency through visual AI
businessAnalytics.fullDescription: Understand your business better with visual analytics. Track customer behavior, analyze foot traffic patterns, monitor operational efficiency, and gain insights that drive business decisions.
features: Heat mapping and dwell time tracking

point1.title: Personal consultation designed with hands-on partnership and deep SME understanding
point1.description: Unlike automated onboarding processes, every OMG Agents client gets a dedicated consultant who learns your business inside-out. We provide hands-on guidance that leads to true growth and problem-solving, from strategy through implementation to ongoing optimization.

point2.title: Built specifically for SMEs, not enterprise giants
point2.description: While others focus on Fortune 500 companies, we specialize exclusively in small and medium enterprises. Our solutions scale with your growth, integrate with your existing tools, and provide enterprise capabilities at SME-friendly complexity and pricing levels.

point3.title: Comprehensive AI solutions beyond just chatbots
point3.description: While others focus solely on chat, OMG Agents provides Chat + Voice + Visual Intelligence solutions. From customer service chatbots to call center automation to security monitoring, we solve the full spectrum of AI automation challenges your business faces.

point4.title: Providing deep and wide added value through ongoing partnership
point4.description: By combining proprietary technology with dedicated consultation, we solve complex challenges according to your specific objectives and growth trajectory. Our relationship doesn't end at deployment - we continuously optimize and evolve your AI solutions as your business grows.

form.name: Name
form.messagePlaceholder: Describe your project goals, challenges, and how AI could help. Be as detailed as you'd like - we're here to understand your needs completely.
form.messageTip: ðŸ’¡ Tip: Include your industry, current processes, and desired outcomes
form.attachmentsInfo: PDF, Word, Text, Images (Max 10MB each, up to 5 files)
form.securityDescription: To help us verify you're human, please confirm:
form.securityCheck1: I am a real person, not a bot
form.securityCheck2: I understand this is a business inquiry
form.securityNote: This helps us maintain the quality of our communications

validation.requiredFields: Please fill in all required fields.
validation.nameLength: Name must be between 2 and 100 characters.
validation.validEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
validation.messageLength: Message must be between 10 and 2000 characters.
validation.takeTime: Please take your time to fill out the form properly.
validation.spamContent: Your message contains content that appears to be spam. Please revise and try again.
validation.rateLimit: Please wait 30 seconds before submitting another message.
validation.formError: Form error. Please refresh the page and try again.
validation.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
validation.successMessage: Thank you! Your message has been sent successfully. We'll get back to you soon.
